channel.title: We are involved in several projects spanning between Science Communication to Luxembourgish cultural events like Schueberfouer. on LuxDoc | The association of the young researchers in Luxembourg
channel.description: Recent content in We are involved in several projects spanning between Science Communication to Luxembourgish cultural events like Schueberfouer. on LuxDoc | The association of the young researchers in Luxembourg

item.title: PubQuiz 2x08
item.description: Pubquiz 2x08: TBD Join us for the LuxDoc PubQuiz and try to guess as many answers as possible while competing with your friends! Teams of maximum 5 people will compete, challenging each other on questions covering (but won’t be limited to) pop culture, science, literature, Luxembourgish culture, TV series, geography, and sport.

item.title: PubQuiz 2x07
item.description: Pubquiz 2x07: Brand New Quizmaster Join us for the LuxDoc PubQuiz and try to guess as many answers as possible while competing with your friends!

item.title: LuxDoc goes to play Boardgames
item.description: Dear LuxDoc community, Let’s enjoy all together a cozy and stimulating afternoon of boardgames while meeting interesting people and discovering new games! This Saturday Luxdoc will host an afternoon session of boardgames.
